website_summaries.verdict: This beard comb fits in its own leather pouch and is strong enough to comb through most beard lengths comfortably. Compact and affordable.
pros: Anti-static design reduces frizziness and stray hairs
Pleasant sandalwood smell and a "manly" appearance
Fits well in hand and ideal for travel use
cons: Shorter comb teeth may not penetrate thicker beard growth
Tends to grab hairs while combing

customer_reviews.title: V & S Depot. Could not get a hold of customer service.
customer_reviews.text: When i first got these i noticed what seemed to be a superficial crack in the wood just off center. I wrote an email with pictures requesting a replacement after a few weeks as the crack got bigger. Yesterday the comb finally split in half in my pocket. I very much liked this comb and understand that wood as a natural material is subject to cracking and defects but I did at least expect a response from this company. There are multiple beard combs of this same style from multiple vendors. Next time I will choose a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael King

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good looking comb. I just received it yesterday, but it's worked great for my goatee, mustache, and hair. Fits well in my hand, and the teeth don't bend or flex like the cheap, black plastic combs I typically use. It costs a little more than those plastic combs, but it's still affordable and ought to last a good deal longer. Really glad I picked this up. The case it came in looks good, too. Though I imagine it won't be long before I get tired of storing it in the case. It's not like leaving the comb in my shave kit is going to hurt it any.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Moren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but received damaged
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this comb, it's beautiful but one of the teeth had a large chip in it which would have made it grab my beard or break off so I repackaged it and sent it back for a refund. I guess they need better quality control. I realize these are hand made but such an imperfection should not be allowed to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Comb I received doesn’t have “Hunter Jack” carved into it. In fact, it doesn’t have anything carved into it. The teeth are not great quality, but not terrible either. I didn’t receive a holder for the comb either. It came in a small bubble envelope by itself from China. I ordered this on 3/19/18 and received it on 4/27/18. It took so long to get here, I had forgotten I ordered this. Just a bad experience all around. I wish I would have had the great experience most of the other people who bought this have had.
customer_reviews.author: El Capitan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. Dry we'll done. Feels great going through your beard. Excellent craftsmanship. I recommend highly. When your beard oil gets into the tines it carries the aroma and smells great the next time you comb. This product is much better then the other beard combs I've seen. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Best wooden comb
customer_reviews.text: I currently own a few of these double sided wooden combs. I can honestly say, out of all my wooden combs, this one is my favorite. It stands out for good reasons. It all begins as you take the comb out of its holster. Holster looks beautiful. The combo's craftsmanship really stands out. Each of the teeth are flawless (which I can't say for other brands). Doesn't snag or tangle. The combs colors are beautiful and the engraved emblem really adds a nice touch. One of the most important things to me in a comb is the spacing between the teeth - this one nailed it. Both spacing patterns are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Liraz

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my husband's stocking this year, and he loved it. He recently grew a beard, and it's just now long enough to need a comb, and he loves the look and feel of this comb and the handy leather case. It's still early days, so I don't know how it will hold up, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Not like the one pictured, different kind of wood
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a sandalwood beard brush like this one before, but the same one is no longer listed, so I tried with this one. I recevied one that is a lot lighter color than the ones pictured, and does not smell like sandalwood. Feels much more like pine wood. It is much lighter in weight and feels cheaper than the one I had (which did look like the ones in the pictures).
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Like the person below
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine. Like the person below, I had forgotten I ordered it because it took so long. Mine also came in a little bubble mailer and did NOT include the leather(ish) comb case. Little disappointed in that. The comb itself seems to be good quality. It's my first one and feels nice running through my beard. All of the teeth are straight. There are a couple of minor cosmetic blemishes in the wood, but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Torkko

customer_reviews.title: Product received was not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not meet the description or photos of what I ordered. Cheap knockoff of the product that I was looking for. Teeth warped and uneven, not “sandalwood” not engraved. Cheap case. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband. Seemed like a well made comb...
customer_reviews.text: But, one of the teeth on the fine end is cracked and split. That’s a nice invitation for a splinter in the face. Returning it. I see this happens with a lot of the wood combs, unfortunately quality control with Amazon is not great. Getting worse with each order.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: From great to horrible
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this comb, it was beautiful. The craftsmanship, the smell, the look. Everything was perfect. THAT comb would get 5 stars across the board. I had to order a second one after mine unfortunately broke. The comb I received the second time was completely different. Bad quality, imperfections, and even the smell was off. If it wasn't for the "Hunter Jack" logo on the comb, it could pass for a Cremo beard comb you can find at Target. Unfortunately, I will be looking elsewhere for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Steve

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gift for My Husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beard comb as a gift for my husband - whose beard is semi-coarse - and he absolutely loves it! He carries around it with him and he uses it for his hair as well! It definitely lives up to everything it claims! The fact that the sandalwood doesn't create static has really made a difference (and he's mentioned that it smells good in his beard too). He loves that it doesn't snag or catch at his hair while he's combing and we've both noticed his beard looking smoother and nicer since he started using this comb every day! Definitely recommend this as a gift for the bearded men in your life!
customer_reviews.author: BriMcG

customer_reviews.title: have a beard? get this.
customer_reviews.text: I've had other combs that have all ended up with missing teeth and weren't able to withstand the daily combing and oiling of a proper beard. I love that this has both large and small teeth to prevent any knots or matter from sticking in the beard Plus sides: smells great, compact, double-sided, comes with a carry sleeve. Downsides: none
customer_reviews.author: Salad

customer_reviews.title: Broke in pocket after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: The size of the comb is pretty decent when it arrived the color didn’t match what was depicted it was fairly plain in color... I used it one day and it broke in my pocket which I found odd because I have a wooden comb that I used the other day and it didn’t break... so I’d say it could be been defective idk but from my experience as of yet it’s pretty much a wast of 13 bucks....
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Its too thick, doesn't comb that well. A .99 comb works much better. It looks cool though.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband for Father’s Day. He had it in his front pocket for a few minutes, sat down and it snapped. It is very lightweight. I also bought him a shaping kit and it came with a surprise comb and you can feel the difference! So they are the exact same size but the other brand feels solid. I don’t suggest this at all.
customer_reviews.author: MelindaS

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, unless you like not-Sandalwood Sandalwood beard combs.
customer_reviews.text: I received my beard comb today, and it's not as described. This is definitely not sandalwood, as it's ridiculously light colored, smells nothing like sandalwood, and if it were sandalwood, it's hollow, which would make for no chance at longevity. I will be sending this product back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb for my husband after seeing the ratings. Before, his beard looked a bit scraggly. Not anymore. He uses it regularly and looks so much more groomed. In addition, it came with a sleeve to keep it in so would be good for travel. Note that it smells of sandalwood.
customer_reviews.author: Katg

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed with change in comb
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a 5. Bought my first one about a year ago. Beautiful comb, beautiful wood. Accidentally broke it, totally my fault. Bought a second one and they must have changed suppliers or something. Wood is lighter in weight and color and doesn't have the same sandalwood scent of my first one, the teeth look unfinished (there is stray wood fibers showing). It just seems a much subpar comb from my original. Ill be looking for a different comb to replace my old one with. Update: After attempting to use it, it doesnt even comb through my beard like the old one. Down to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Quality Comb
customer_reviews.text: Received my comb and it came in perfect condition with no broken teeth or anything cracked. The picture advertised shows like the comb almost has a clear coat to it or some type of sheen and atleast mine is more so like a smooth raw wood type of finish which is no big deal just pointing it out. The comb itself works great and I have had no problems with it and also the leather case is convenient to store it in. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jake C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Crap
customer_reviews.text: It broke. The fine tooth side of the brush broke with minimal usage. I would never recommend this product, nor would ever buy it again. What a complete piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: <Anvil.Chorus>

customer_reviews.title: Great Comb, Cheap Case
customer_reviews.text: What sold me was the video where they showed the product, and the REAL Leather case. I ordered without hesitation because of the price, but I feel let down with the quality of the "obviously not-real" leather case that just feels flimsy and cheap. The comb itself is fine and does have a nice scent to it. Would I buy this for myself? Probably. Would I buy this as a gift? I would probably look for something that feels a little higher quality... and I do feel "duped" by the video. Maybe things have changed since the video was made, but nobody pointed this out in the first page of reviews I breezed through.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing and construction feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this comb from Amazon because it is made of sandalwood. I have a mustache comb from Dollar Beard Club and I loved how it smelled. I bought their bigger comb but the teeth were too far apart and it wasn't sandalwood. This product is exactly what I was looking for and I love it. If looking for this style of beard comb, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Milleson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works but it looks nothing like the image. After reading about Sandlewood the color may change overtime. I always would use plastic with the little teeth and come to find out the wide teeth work better on my beard. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: ChinoXS203

customer_reviews.title: Great beard comb
customer_reviews.text: Nice little beard comb. Looks good, well made, works well. Definitely reccomend over a plastic one for home use. I've traveled with it already a few times no problem, love having the case.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: My first and only beard comb I will own!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first real beard comb that i've owned and I couldn't be happier with it. It's the perfect compact size and naturally smells great too as its made of Sandalwood. It works great with some Duke Cannon beard balm that I just got and helps to evenly work it into my beard. I'm very particular about beard products and this one knocks it out of the park. Great product and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid start
customer_reviews.text: So as some reviewers have reported, the comb comes in a lighter color and looks/smells like pine. The cuts are very well done and the spacing is symmetrical. It is a sturdy comb with a solid core. The outer surfaces are nicely sanded but in between the fingers are not. You will definitely want to sand in between so as not to tear at your beard. It's an easy thing to do. Overall the comb is a good start and the case with the sweet logo make it a great combo to get caught grooming your beard with.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Product Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to plagiarize an earlier review stating my exact thoughts on this product. There are lots of these wood combs on Amazon but I choose to pay a little more money for this beard comb because the pictures show gorgeous looking wood grains. I received my comb today and while it's functional, the wood is very basic and looks like the cheaper ones available from other sellers. I will be returning this product. Attached is a picture of the product so you can manage expectations compared to whatever product pictures are showing at the time.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: amazing comb. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Legit makes the fiances beard so soft. He loves to carry it around, as he has a Gandalf beard and it gets tangled often, said he loves it as it doesnt catch and pull on his beard.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Comb
customer_reviews.text: I have a small scraggly bread that I am trying to cultivate. I've used the comb for about 3 days now, and my bread hair is noticeable less homeless looking. Other than that, it's a great comb that's made well.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comb!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wanted a comb for Valentine's day. So I bought him one early. He will not put it down and keeps combing his beard. He said the sandlewood that it's made of smells good too. Leather pouch is very well made as is the comb. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jeanette asher

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: My previous comb caught some water,shrank and broke so I bought this one hoping for a more positive experience. I usually use it when my beard is a bet damp after shower and one time it did shrank and bent for a while. However , leaving it to dry , it retained its original shape and structure and got back to functioning as it should be. I am very pleased with this product and I definitely recommend it for rough users like me.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Kadi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comb!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb based on the reviews, and I was not disappointed. It was a nice weight that makes it comfortable to use, it does its job perfectly, and it looks really stylish and well made. A gift for a gentleman!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The comb is constructed out of a single piece of Sandalwood. It smelled a bit "lacquery" right out of the packaging, but after a few days of regular use with oils and balms, it began to pick up those scents. The ends of the comb are a bit too broad for my liking, making it some-what difficult to get into the neck-jawline part of my beard, but I imagine it's this way for structural integrity. The teeth on the comb are excellent, and both sides are spaced perfectly. I would most likely buy this comb again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: I keep my combs in my back pocket. This ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep my combs in my back pocket. This has broken teeth after 2 days of carrying. I have had many other combs last at least 3-4 months before being in my back pocket causes a tooth to come off. Expected more with this product, but the cheap Honest Amish things last longer it seems?
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift with their beard oil also. It was so beautifully packaged from the case to the comb and very high quality. Hunter Jack cares about customer satisfaction and I appreciate that so much from a company. The gift recipient loves the comb and oil both and uses them often and was very pleased to receive them. I loved the quality of the beard comb and beard oil from Hunter Jack!
customer_reviews.author: KColYo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Like that it had two sides with different spacing. I use the “big” side first then the more fine side. Doesn’t scratch skin. Nice little case too. It’s about the length and width of a playing card but with nice thickness. I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MrBigGuy13

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: Comb works just find and as advertised. Small enough to throw in your travel bag with other things such as shaver, hair brush, toothbrush, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beard Comb
customer_reviews.text: I'm kinda new to the whole fancy-wooden-comb thing, but this one is really neat. It has that great sandalwood smell, feels great going through my beard, and comes with a neat leather carrying pouch. For my first wooden beard comb, I think I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lunetta

customer_reviews.title: Manly in appearance and function
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this comb. It doesn't tangle or pull with his beard, it's very durable as well as beautiful. The pocket makes it handy for carrying around for touch-up grooming. If you're looking for a good, manly-looking beard comb that does what it ought, here it is!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great beard comb
customer_reviews.text: Totally surprised by the comb. Works great and love the pocket sleeve. The comb leaves a scent and oily feeling after brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Madone08

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived damaged. I cannot speak to quality since I will not be giving it to the person it was purchased for. It arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: VideoDog

customer_reviews.title: Made In China !
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but teeth were too wide for my beard. Somewhat bulky for carrying in your pocket. And worse, Made in China !
customer_reviews.author: bw in OH

customer_reviews.title: breaks very easy .
customer_reviews.text: i had the comb for about 2 weeks when i broke it by carry it in my pocket . it was my favorite comb . miss it
customer_reviews.author: aaron mundy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable in the hand,like the cut of the teeth of the comb,nice weight to it. Doesn't smell nice, but it's a wood comb....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad who likes to carry a little comb in his travel bag. This comb is actually for his hair. I think this comb will fit well in his hand and he will like the quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice comb. I bought one for my husband and he loves it. I’m getting 3 more for our boys. It smells nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Joule

customer_reviews.title: Beard life
customer_reviews.text: I love this comb! Bought it once lost that one and then I bought it again! Excellent quality and smells good! If you have a beard this comb is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Big Pancho

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price and seems to be holding ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he is obsessed. Almost to the point that I almost regret getting it haha. Good quality for the price and seems to be holding up. I got it for him for Christmas 2017. So far he has not complained.
customer_reviews.author: J. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: It looks every bit as nice in person as it did online
customer_reviews.text: Just opened up this comb. It looks every bit as nice in person as it did online. Yep, smells better than in the pictures lol. Feel great in the hand and better on my face...smooth and awesome is my immediate impression of the comb and the case is great as well
customer_reviews.author: Bob V.

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: Never leave home without it. Great for beard maintenance and any mid day itchiness throughout my shift at work. Holds onto beard oil some and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I was not very impressed with both the craftsmanship of this comb or the advertising. The one end is chipped up and sharp as though it was clamped in a vice or something else while they were doing finish work on it. Also, the wood color is not the same as what is shown in the picture. I will likely toss this and find another from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have this well-made comb from Hunter Jack Barber Co. It fits nicely in my pocket in the leather sleeve it came with. With my lengthening beard, I needed something to get those hairs in line, and this does the job just fine. I even can use it on my head when things get a bit wild. Thanks, to the Hunter Jack team for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Not good... not horrible.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but just feels cheap. Case is much thinner and cheaper than it looks in the photo. Since it’s cheap I won’t send it back but I feel like it’s a dollar store type item.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice look and feel to it. Sadly I lost mine. Would recommend if you are looking for a beard comb.
customer_reviews.author: Grahaminator

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Beard Combing
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar shape comb that is metal. The Sandal Wood is definitely a smoother pull through the beard hair. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY DRURY

customer_reviews.title: Just what a beard needs....
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me as a last minute gift. The comb is quite unique when held. It has a comfortable feel to it and is easy on the skin when combed through the beard. The sandalwood has a distinctive odor to it, pretty much seems like a smell that should go with a beard. Overall thoroughly pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Small. Compact. Sturdy. Perfect! It's a simple product. It does what it's supposed to and smells excellent. Love the leather sleeve it comes with. Fits perfect in any pocket and sturdy enough to hold in my back pocket even when sitting down. If I ever need another one, I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool manly beard comb
customer_reviews.text: Buy one even if you don't have a beard - it adds points to your Man Card
customer_reviews.author: KFM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent and nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Great comb! It smells absolutely amazing and really helps me distribute oils and balms through my beard and has a very nicely made pu leather case. Would give 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Steezy904

customer_reviews.title: Smooth tooth
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smooth tooth comb, I like the color and pouch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best beard comb!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product highly recommend! The wood smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best brush out there
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good smell and overall my favorite beard brush.
customer_reviews.author: Yaron

customer_reviews.title: Manliest Comb of Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This is the manliest comb I have ever seen and it is worth every penny. It smells amazing, like sandalwood. The pouch adds an extra manly touch along with keeping the comb safe from damage and grossies. This is randomly an amazing gift for men and my husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: Sleek hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sleek hairbrush. Gets the job done, and is made of very nice material. Great to keep around at work or in your bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Good comb. Nice sandlewood and smells great. I gave it 4 stars just cause it is a little think, and makes actual combing a little awkward, but still a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described; very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: i love this comb; my girlfriend didn't believe me when I told her how much I paid (she was giving me crap for spending more money on beard products). The green sandlewood is notably more unique and better quality than a previous regular sandlewood comb I bought on Amazon. Two sizes are nice to have for different areas on my beard, and the leather casing helps prevent breakage like I experienced with my last wooden comb (I prefer to keep them in my back pocket). More than worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband carries this comb in his pocket almost daily, and has really been caring for his beard since getting it and a conditioner he purchased also. It's compact and sturdy and does what he needs it to do
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comb and beautiful case. I carry it in my back pocket and does great work making my beard look great in demand!! My wife always loves the way I look, I got a 12 inch long beard!!
customer_reviews.author: Yitzchok h.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any man
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son love their combs ... great product...
customer_reviews.author: Diane Griffin

customer_reviews.title: ... some months back and its been one of the best purchases for my face man and does great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this comb some months back and its been one of the best purchases for my face man and does great for the head mane on the go. I use it daily and have had no issues with the quality of the comb and has survived in my pocket on some rough workdays. I love the smell of the sandalwood too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wood

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I bought this for my husband and he loved it. Very good quality, looks incredible and works great!! I highly recommend for any and all men in your life. Makes a great gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are just the right spacing apart on both sides and the comb has this nice weight to it that is not too much but it lets you know it is real wood. And it smells good, so there is that. I lost it for a few months and had to get a cheaper one that looked similar, I really missed this one and was very glad when I found it again!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Watterud

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The comb looked nothing like the picture. The wood looks like some normal pine and not the nice sand wood in the picture. Also, there was string coming off the leather pouch. There were splinters coming off the teeth of the comb. Poor craftsmanship. Time to look for a new beard comb.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Mubarik

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and works amazingly well. I didn't think it would be much different than a plastic comb but it really does cut through a thick beard very easily without snagging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also smelled like they used the cheapest oil they could find to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan, the one i got had several teeth that were not finished had to cut them and file them down to make it work. Also smelled like they used the cheapest oil they could find to seal it. Ended up making my beard smell like flax or linseed oil, would not recommend

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent comb, does not look like the pictures shown on Amazon. Not sure if it’s genuine sandalwood, looks more like bamboo to me. The craftsmanship is also not that good. Feels cheap and the teeth on the comb have small splinters that were not sanded out properly. Def not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John kross

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT look like the advertised wood.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a wood comb, but got this one specifically because I liked the way the wood looked. Very disappointed that it was just a plain jane wood comb. The comb itself is fine... just would’ve bought one of the cheaper ones that looked exactly the same. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the different sized teeth make it easy to comb my beard. Best comb I've bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: OTownPyro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice beard comb. Does not snag your beard like the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beard Comb
customer_reviews.text: I like the protective case so the teeth dont get caught in my shirt pocket The styling and color are very nice. and the comb functions without flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Chef

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: I carry this wherever I go now. It fits perfectly in the tiny pocket of my jeans. The leather pouch is a nice touch and so far the comb has held up to repeated uses throughout each day.
customer_reviews.author: Colburn Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Not as seems
customer_reviews.text: I know this might sound ridiculous but I ordered this comb bc of the look of the wood grain. Looks different than the others on the market. Don’t be fooled by the pic. It’s the same generic boring brown of any other. Also feels cheaper than my Viking I had before.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for long beards
customer_reviews.text: Not great for long beards. My beard is 6+ inches, teeth on comb aren't long enough for the amount of beard. Comb seemed overly oily when received. Nice looking, would be great for short beards.
customer_reviews.author: David Dorney

customer_reviews.title: great comb
customer_reviews.text: the comb is great has a nice wood smell to it and it easily combs though my thick wild beard but while it looks nice and smells nice and even works nice it's no better then any cheaper wood comb you can get at half the price the only thing that sets it apart is the leather sleeve they include
customer_reviews.author: lincoln

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé as part of his Valentine gift. He has recently started growing out his beard and he absolutely LOVES this comb.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is the beard comb you need.
customer_reviews.text: I saw other similar products to this one for a few dollars less, but this one is absolutely worth it. The sandalwood smells, looks, and feels amazing. I thought buying a comb would make me less manly, but this comb makes me feel like a true gentleman.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Looking Beard
customer_reviews.text: Gave this beard comb to my son-in-law. He commented on how much he likes the sandal wood smell. Great gift for those bearded fellows!
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE WAY IT SMELLS CANT GET MY WIFE AWAY ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE WAY IT SMELLS CANT GET MY WIFE AWAY FROM ME ALWAYS SMELLING MY BEARD SHE SAYS I SMELL LIKE AN OUTDOORSMAN 😂😂 I DONT KNOW WHAT SHE MEANS BUT HEY ITS WORKING LOL
customer_reviews.author: raul gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Best beard comb I’ve bought yet
customer_reviews.text: Best beard comb I’ve bought yet! No snagging/pulling at all. Going to pick up another to keep in the truck as a back up, Incase I forget to throw the comb in my pocket when I leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he really likes the way it combs his beard. I’ve notice his beard looks neater and less bushy since using the comb daily. The travel sleeve is a great way to keep the comb clean and protected between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roland

customer_reviews.title: Best beard comb you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great beard comb! I bought this comb about 6 months ago and I love it. One side is more spaced apart and is great for getting the morning knots out. The other side is more narrowly spaced and is perfect for spreading around the beard oil and getting it deep down into your beard. This comb also smells amazing. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband keeps his in his pocket all the time to keep his beard straight. Great quality and size!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great beard comb!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my boyfriend and we both love it! He says it combs through his beard smoothly without pulling, and the size of it is perfect. We both LOVE the smell! We are very happy with this purchase. Great beard comb!
customer_reviews.author: Momlife4

customer_reviews.title: Got my man's beard lookin like a snack
customer_reviews.text: This comb took my boyfriends scraggly beard and turned it into a beard so fine, even unicorns would be jealous. 10/10 would brush again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Crafted and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye to cheap plastic, hello Hunter Jack! Purchased this as an addition to a beard grooming kit and we were wowed by the quality. Never using anything else to tame the beard again :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Race

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. Does not create static, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: tunruh

customer_reviews.title: Bigly Beard
customer_reviews.text: Really nice comb. Great size for pocket carrying. The woodwork is fabulous. No burrs or places to snag hairs. Plus, the leather case is really nice. The whole thing looks great.
customer_reviews.author: russell bell

customer_reviews.title: The mostly straight one is great. All came with a treated smell
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 to keep one at home, work and in my car. 2/3 were badly warped and had uneven comb teeth. The mostly straight one is great. All came with a treated smell. With a better smell and a consistent product it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Camm
